label: Actuarial Problem Solving
description: Methods and techniques of solving problems in actuarial mathematics for advanced students intending to enter the actuarial profession. Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 4 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
courseSectionInformation: Approved for S/U grading only. May be repeated in the same or separate terms to a maximum of 4 hours. Prerequisite: Consent of instructor.
classScheduleInformation: Students planning to sit for the "Course 1" Actuarial exam should register for section X. This will carry a 1 hour credit only.
